Class World

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              World
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, ModelDisplay
public class World
extends javax.swing.JComponent
implements ModelDisplay

Class to represent a 2d world that can hold turtles and display them
Copyright Georgia Institute of Technology 2004

See Also:
